access: Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Purifying Breeze](/Feats.aspx?ID=3643) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 85</row>

**Prerequisites**
[divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2) spells

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

**Requirements**
Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip spell with the [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89) trait.

</column>

---

You transfer the divine essence of your magic to the air around you, cleansing it of toxins. Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against each airborne [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) or [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) effect in a 15-foot radius around you. Regardless of your success or failure, until the beginning of your next turn, all creatures in the purified area gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.
name: Purifying Breeze
requirement: Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip spell with the  healing  trait.

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > Purifying Breeze Single Action Source Knights of Lastwall pg. 85 Prerequisites divine spells Access Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat. Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip spell with the healing trait. --- You transfer the divine essence of your magic to the air around you, cleansing it of toxins. Attempt a counteract check against each airborne disease or poison effect in a 15-foot radius around you. Regardless of your success or failure, until the beginning of your next turn, all creatures in the purified area gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.
